definition: Luannan county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei
river and county in Hebei Province
Luannan county in Tangshan 唐山[Tang2 shan1], Hebei

sentences.english: This paper is aim to uncover the difference of the three areas of Luannan dialect through my study in the real places.
sentences.chinese: 本文試圖通過實地調查，弄清灤南三片話的內部差異。
